definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very

sentences.chinese: 是一個可選的文件管理器。

sentences.english: It has an easy mounting solution thanks to the optional wall-mount arm.
sentences.chinese: 它有一個易於安裝的解決方案由於可選的壁掛式手臂。

sentences.english: According to Mai Ling, there are two ways to access the lower level.
sentences.chinese: 據梅玲所說，到下面一層有兩條路可選。

sentences.english: However, if the Internet is the only outlet available, it's better than nothing, he said.
sentences.chinese: 當然，如因特網是唯一可選的途徑，那總比沒有好。

sentences.english: An optional nickel-plated input unit and foot mounts are available for right-angle drive applications.
sentences.chinese: 可選的鍍鎳輸入裝置和腳坐騎爲直角傳動應用提供。

sentences.english: All other properties are either optional or have a suitable default value.
sentences.chinese: 其他所有屬性都是可選的或是有適當的默認值。

sentences.english: designers tend to use few mandatory fields
sentences.chinese: 設計師試圖不用必填項和可選項。

sentences.english: Optionally, the database tables created by the application can be deleted.
sentences.chinese: 可選地，可以刪除由此應用程序創建的數據庫表。

sentences.english: R26; But the tendency to simplify blinds them to other alternatives.
sentences.chinese: 但是這種簡化傾向會他們對於其他的可選項視而不見。

sentences.english: Indexes are defined to optimize queries and, optionally, to guarantee uniqueness.
sentences.chinese: 可選地，定義索引來優化查詢和保證唯一性。

sentences.english: These are the 50 students selected to compete in Classroom Deathmatch.
sentences.chinese: 參見死鬥教室競賽的有50名可選的學生。

sentences.english: An optional gamma counting NaI well is also available.
sentences.chinese: 該計數器還有一個可選的伽瑪計數碘化鈉孔。

sentences.english: The results showed that psoriasis modulating mixture had selective regulation effects on immune responses.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明銀屑解憂膏可選擇性地調節免疫功能。

sentences.english: In syntax , items inside square brackets are optional.
sentences.chinese: 在語法中，方括號中的項是可選項。

sentences.english: Optional lighting designs are available for special applications such as photostability testing.
sentences.chinese: 有用於光穩定性測試等特殊應用的可選照明項。

sentences.english: The amount of droop may be changed internally or with an optional external lever. Learn more from 3161 product spec 03102.
sentences.chinese: 金額下垂可能會改爲在國內或同一個可選的外部槓桿。

definition: to choose arbitrarily/to take whichever one fancies
to choose for some purpose/to select and use
to order à la carte/single point (of measurement, mounting etc)
take-out (fast food)/(outer part of) tire/as well/besides/into the bargain/outer zone
